lead_paragraph: BRISTOL, Conn., Aug. 12 (AP) — A Vermont manager’s failure to let one of his players get enough playing time gave the Portsmouth, N.H., Little League all-stars a forfeit victory.
snippet: BRISTOL, Conn., Aug. 12 (AP) — A Vermont manager’s failure to let one of his players get enough playing time gave the Portsmouth, N.H., Little League all-stars a forfeit victory.
